title: Componentization
content:
Entry 021: Componentization.

Static analysis flagged the DesktopEnvironment monolith. We have refactored. The Taskbar, SlopMeter, Clock, StartMenu, and DesktopIcons are now discrete functional units. The code is cleaner. The architecture is more resilient. Each widget manages its own subscriptions to the file system and time engine. Modularity is the path to stability.
